details.command: python3 train.py --arch resnet18 --dataset CIFAR10Idx --dataset-idx ${idx} --k ${k} --exp-mode prune --dataset-idx-method wrn --exp-name resnet18_idx${idx}_wrn_ratio${k}_adv --trainer adv --val-method adv --source-net results/pretrained/resnet18_adv_pretrain.pth.tar --scaled-score-init --result-dir results
